name: Doki Doki Ragnarok (GGJ18 Entry)
description:
Doki Doki Ragnarok – A wealth transmission simulator.

Can you find common battlegrounds with the villages? Or will you be rejected in favor of a more handsome raiding party?

We made an actual game based on this Prototype!

Source Code
  • Download: https://github.com/BrutalHack/ggj18
  • License: GPL v3
Technology used

Unity, Photoshop, Jetbrains Rider, Git

Help / Controls

Mouse-Only.

Click on the Text box to advance to the next piece of dialog.

Game Jam
  • Global Game Jam 2018
  • Theme: Transmission
  • Time: 45 hours
Team
  • Benjamin Justice (Code)
  • Stefanie Curth (Art)
  • Christian Plinke (Music & Sound)
  • Henrik Porath (Game Design, Animation)
  • Daniel Mielnicki (Code)
